name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

<Target Action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: target, front, 20
  wait for movement
end

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
mp +10%: user
death break
wait: 8
</Target Action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

name: Study Enemy
note:
<Before Eval>
if (target.isEnemy()) {
  var id = target._enemyId;
  $gameSystem.addHpGaugeEnemy(id);

  var text = target.name() + '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]HP:\\c[0] ' + target.hp;
  text += '/' + target.mhp;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MP:\\c[0] ' + target.mp;
  text += '/' + target.mmp;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]TP:\\c[0] ' + target.tp;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]ATK:\\c[0] ' + target.atk;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MAT:\\c[0] ' + target.mat;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]AGI:\\c[0] ' + target.agi;
  text += '\n';
  text += '\\px[100]\\c[4]DEF:\\c[0] ' + target.def;
  text += '\\px[400]\\c[4]MDF:\\c[0] ' + target.mdf;
  text += '\\px[700]\\c[4]LUK:\\c[0] ' + target.luk;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
 
  var weakness = '';
  var resist = '';
  var immune = '';
  var absorb = '';
  var elements = $dataSystem.elements;
  for (var i = 1; i < elements.length; ++i) {
    var name = elements[i];
    var rate = target.elementRate(i);
    if (rate > 1) {
      weakness += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 0) {
      absorb += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate === 0) {
      immune += name + ' ';
    } else if (rate < 1) {
      resist += name + ' ';
    }
  }
  if (weakness === '') weakness = 'None';
  if (resist === '') resist = 'None';
  if (immune === '') immune = 'None';
  if (absorb === '') absorb = 'None';
  weakness = '\\c[4]Weakness:\\c[0] ' + weakness + '\n';
  resist = '\\c[4]Resist:\\c[0] ' + resist + '\n';
  immune = '\\c[4]Immune:\\c[0] ' + immune + '\n';
  absorb = '\\c[4]Absorb:\\c[0] ' + absorb;
  text = weakness + resist + immune + absorb;
  $gameMessage.add(text);
}
</Before Eval>

name: Attack
note:

  move user: target, front, 20

action effect
death break

name: Heal
note:

<End Timed Attack>

<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<Target Action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: target, front, 20
  wait for movement
end

face user: target

timed attack

perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8
</Target Action>

name: Double Poke
note:
<Timed Attack: circle>
<End Timed Attack>

<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<Target Action>
immortal: targets, true
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  camera focus: target
  zoom: 150%,20
  move user: target, front, 20
  wait for movement
end

timed attack

if $gameTemp.tas_power >= 1
force critical
end

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

normal critical

if $gameTemp.tas_power > 0

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

end

immortal: targets, false
</Target Action>

name: Fire, Ice, and Lightning
note:
<Timed Attack: circle>
<End Timed Attack>

<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<Target Action>
immortal: targets, true

timed attack

if $gameTemp.tas_power >=1
force critical
end

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

normal critical

if $gameTemp.tas_power > 0
timed attack
eval: this._addtionTest = true
else
eval: this._addtionTest = false
end

if $gameTemp.tas_power >= 1
force critical
end

if this._addtionTest == true

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
animation 0071: target
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8
end

normal critical

if $gameTemp.tas_power > 0

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
animation 0076: target
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

end

immortal: targets, false
</Target Action>

name: Counter
note:
<Timed Attack: clock>
<End Timed Attack>

<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<Counter Condition>
Eval: defender._classId === 0004
</Counter Condition>

<Target Action>
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20

timed attack

reset camera
reset zoom
wait for zoom


eval: BattleManager._actorIndex = $gameParty.members().indexOf(user)

if $gameTemp.tas_power > 0
action animation

eval: this._skillWindow.setActor(user)
eval: this._skillWindow.setStypeId(2)
eval: this._skillWindow.refresh()
eval: this._skillWindow.show()
eval: this._skillWindow.activate()
end
</Target Action>
